text: fmn talab lqda' shhwth ghyr alzwjat walmmlwkat, fawlyk hum almtjawzwn alhlal 'iilaa alhram. waladhin hum hafizun lamanat allh, wamanat alebad, whafzwn lehwdhm mae allah taealaa wamae alebad, waladhin ywddun shhadathm bialhaqi dun taghyir 'aw ktman, waladhin yuhafizun ealaa 'ada' alsalat wala ykhllun bishay' min wajbatha. 'uwlayik almtsfwn bitilk alawsaf aljlylt mstqrrun fi janaat alneym, mukramun fiha bikuli 'anwae altkrym
